code:
```verilog
module TopModule(
    input logic clk,
    input logic reset,
    output logic [3:0] q
);

  always_ff @(posedge clk) begin
    if (reset) begin
      q <= 4'b0001; // Reset the counter to 1
    end else if (q == 4'b1010) begin
      q <= 4'b0001; // Wrap around from 10 to 1
    end else begin
      q <= q + 1; // Increment the counter
    end
  end

endmodule
```

iterations.code:
```verilog
module TopModule(
    input logic clk,
    input logic reset,
    output logic [3:0] q
);

  always_ff @(posedge clk) begin
    if (reset) begin
      q <= 4'b0001; // Reset the counter to 1
    end else if (q == 4'b1010) begin
      q <= 4'b0001; // Wrap around from 10 to 1
    end else begin
      q <= q + 1; // Increment the counter
    end
  end

endmodule
```
